com.microblink.hardware.camera.camera1.focus

Interface IFocusManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoFocusManager, ContinuousAutofocusManager, StillFocusManager

    public interface IFocusManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelOngoingFocus()
      Cancel current ongoing focus operation and set focus to default position.
      void checkFocus()
      Checks if autofocus should be refreshed.
      void dispose()
      Called when all internal resources of the focus manager should be disposed.
      void doAutofocus(boolean force)
      Method requests from manager to initiate camera focusing process.
      void invalidateFocus()
      Method invalidates current focus so that next doAutofocus(false) call will request a new focus.
      boolean isAutofocusing() 
      boolean isAutoFocusSupported() 
      boolean isCameraFocused() 
      boolean isContinuous()
      Returns true if autofocus manager is continous autofocus manager (i.e.
      void pauseFocusing()
      Method pauses the work of the manager.
      void resumeFocusing()
      Method resumes the work of the manager.
      void setCamera(android.hardware.Camera camera)
      Method sets the camera which focus will be managed by this manager.
      void setMeteringAreas(android.graphics.Rect[] areas)
      Set areas used to measure focus and exposure.

    • Method Detail

      • isCameraFocused

        boolean isCameraFocused()
        Returns:
        true if camera is in focus, otherwise false

      • isAutofocusing

        boolean isAutofocusing()
        Returns:
        true if camera is currently performing autofocus, otherwise false

      • cancelOngoingFocus

        void cancelOngoingFocus()
        Cancel current ongoing focus operation and set focus to default position.

      • doAutofocus

        void doAutofocus(boolean force)
        Method requests from manager to initiate camera focusing process.
        Parameters:
        force - If true, camera focusing process will be violently started.

      • checkFocus

        void checkFocus()
        Checks if autofocus should be refreshed.

      • invalidateFocus

        void invalidateFocus()
        Method invalidates current focus so that next doAutofocus(false) call will request a new focus.

      • resumeFocusing

        void resumeFocusing()
        Method resumes the work of the manager.

      • pauseFocusing

        void pauseFocusing()
        Method pauses the work of the manager.

      • setCamera

        void setCamera(@Nullable
               android.hardware.Camera camera)
        Method sets the camera which focus will be managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        camera - Camera to be used.

      • setMeteringAreas

        void setMeteringAreas(@Nullable
                      android.graphics.Rect[] areas)
        Set areas used to measure focus and exposure. Set to null to use default.
        Parameters:
        areas - Areas to use.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Called when all internal resources of the focus manager should be disposed.

      • isContinuous

        boolean isContinuous()
        Returns true if autofocus manager is continous autofocus manager (i.e. knows how to focus image after scene has been changed)/

      • isAutoFocusSupported

        boolean isAutoFocusSupported()
